Fire Nation Trade Bureau Office I
Fire Nation Trade Bureau Office II
Fire Nation Trade Bureau Office III
A few bureaucrats oversee the smooth transfer of goods here.
A dedicated corps of bureaucrats ensure that trade is free and flowing here.
A small army of bureaucrats assist in cataloguing and facilitating trade here.
A small attachment of the Dragon Guard stays here.
An attachment of the Dragon Guard organises communications here.
The Dragon Guard recruits and trains here.
The best and brightest at the Royal Academy can learn from the myriad of travellers passing through the trade post.
High Priority trade goods are processed by the Trade Offices, stamped with a royal seal.
Most trade is processed by the Trade Offices, stamped with a royal seal.
All trade is processed by the Trade Offices, stamped with a royal seal.
A garrison of Earth Benders keep any trouble to a minimum.
A large garrison of Earth Benders keep any trouble to a minimum.
Students both foreign and domestic study at the university, learning from all the travellers passing through.
A simple port to trade pelts and other animal products with foreign merchants.
A sizeable trade port. Ships stocked with Antarctic goods come and go regularly.
A grand trade port, bustling with merchants from all over the world eager for Antarctic wares.
A garrison filled with waterbenders ready to freeze invaders.
Dedicated hunting grounds will allow the Water Tribe to meet the demands of trade, and test new, experimental methods while they do so.
